cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 510 mi (815 km) south-southeast of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking northwest to north-northwest across the western Gulf of Mexico toward the central Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Texas coast between Port Mansfield and San Luis Pass

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from north of Port Mansfield to San Luis Pass; Storm Surge Watch Port Mansfield to High Island; Tropical Storm Watch Boca de Catan, Mexico to Port Mansfield and north of San Luis Pass to High Island
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and upper Texas coast and southwest Louisiana
